thread.title: Blac Chyna jokes about son King Cairo's heavy New Year's Eve celebrations saying he 'drank too much'
thread.title_full: Blac Chyna jokes about son King Cairo's heavy New Year's Eve celebrations saying he 'drank too much'

author: Vicki Newman
title: Blac Chyna jokes about son King Cairo's heavy New Year's Eve celebrations saying he 'drank too much'
text:
Blac Chyna jokes about son King Cairo's heavy New Year's Eve celebrations saying he 'drank too much' The reality star had fun as she suggested her son had a little too much apple juice Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Blac Chyna shares vid of son King 'hungover on apple juice' Share this video Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Blac Chyna had fun with her son King Cairo as she woke him from his post-New Year's Eve slumber ad suggested he'd partied a little too hard. 
In a cute video, the reality star stirred the four-year-old from his sleep, telling him it's "New Year's". 
With a filter that puts a pair of novelty 2017 glasses on his face, King rubs his eyes as his mum laughs. 
Hugging him close, the Rob & Chyna star continues the video saying: "What happened? You tired? Did you party last night?" Read More Chyna took a cute video of King (Photo: Instagram/blacchyna) 
She adds: "You was turned up, King. I heard you drank all the apple juice last night." 
Chyna, 28, shared the sweet video on Instagram, captioning it "Family". 
Her fans loved it, rushing to wish her and her family a Happy New Year. 
Others told Chyna how cute they think King is. Chyna had fun as she made the video (Photo: Instagram/Blacchyna) She suggested he'd partied too hard on New Year's Eve (Photo: Instagram/blacchyna) 
One said: "Love him, he's just so cute" 
Another wrote: "He's so stinkin' cuuuute" 
And another said: "So sweet he loves his mommy" 
It looks like things are getting back to normal for Chyna after a dramatic few weeks. She said he drank too much apple juice (Photo: Instagram/blacchyna) 
On Thursday, her fiancé Rob Kardashian - with whom she has a daughter, Dream - was rushed to hospital after complications from his Type 2 diabetes and the stress of filming their show. 
Earlier this month it was revealed the popular show, which follows the life of Rob, Blac Chyna and their sometimes turbulent relationship, had been renewed for a second season. But Rob doesn’t want to take part. 
“He doesn’t want to do the show any more, he just wants to live his life with Chyna and Dream and not have to worry about doing a TV show,” a source told HollywoodLife . Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
